previous: Feel free to add yourself to the list at WikiProject Portals/Participants.
See: Portals for deletion at MfD.

An archived method for proposing portals can be found at Portal/Proposals. Currently, there is no process for the proposal and approval of new portals. If you want to create a new portal, see the Portal page and participate in the discussions at Portal talk. You may also talk about your idea for a new portal at this project's talk page. We'll be happy to review your idea and help out where we can.
